title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4108.6 - Time to post overnight conditions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4108.6 - Time to post overnight conditions

State Regulations

Conditions for races shall be posted in the declaration
room at least 25 hours before the closing of declarations thereto, except where
conditions for three successive days racing are posted in which event such
conditions shall be posted at least 18 hours prior to the closing of
declarations to the first of such three days' conditions. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4108.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
